name: Escape The Ship (Rachel Tiv)
description:
This is my completed 2D Platformer Project that I have called Escape The Ship.

My modifications are:

1. Three unique level layouts planned out using online grid paper.

2.  Three different backgrounds of space and a new title page.

3. Designed a new backdrop and adjusted the UI accordingly(white text, spacing).

4. Designed an icon for my game.

I couldn't figure out why level 2 for the WebGL version wouldn't play without level 2's space background covering the tiles although I tried to build to WebGL and zip the file a few times only for it to change what level this occurred on. However I did test it on my Macbook and everything played alright despite it being the same build.
